import React from 'react' import { Formik } from 'formik' import Swal from 'sweetalert2' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Review = () => { const reviewSubmit = async (formdata, {resetForm}) => { console.log(formdata) resetForm() const res = await fetch('http://localhost:5000/review/add', { method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify(formdata), headers:{ 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }) console.log(res.status) if (res.status === 200){ Swal.fire({ icon: 'success', title: "Success", text: 'Review Submitted' }) } } return (
{({ values, handleSubmit, handleChange }) => (

YOUR REVIEW HERE

See All Reviews
)}
) } export default Review
